attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament & Hold New General Election Without Party Financial Donations
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government has been acting without interest of the electorate and the public.

It is time to call a close to parliament and hold new elections and referendums in the spring of 2012.

Sign this e-petition so that the current Parliament be disolved or a referendum on such, and new elections and following referendums be held.

The fraud and corruption of our country's institutions are prevalent.  The financial crisis has been met with no response of regulation or taxation from the government.

There should be limitation to the amount of donations received and the amount of advertising spent for any candidate and party.

Parties should be transparent, and individuals should be allowed access to the same advertising methods and scale of budgets.
